HEROKU_URL.description: The URL of this Heroku app.

S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Set your AWS Access Key ID to enable S3 file storage. Leave blank to disable file uploads.

S3_ACCESS_SECRET_KEY.description: AWS Access Secret Key, if using S3 file storage.

S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of your S3 bucket on AWS, if using S3 file storage.

S3_BUCKET_REGION.description: Region of your S3 bucket on AWS, if using S3 file storage.

S3_ASSET_HOST_URL.description: Optional custom CDN asset host url, if using S3 file storage.

PGSSLMODE.description: PostgreSQL SSL connection mode. Set to 'require' to force SSL. Unset it to use the default.
